name: lambda_hello_world_starter
description: hello world sample for NodeJS written in TypeScript
author: Miro

scripts.start:watch: npm run pre-build && concurrently -k -n "build,server" -c "magenta.bgBlack,cyan.bgBlack" "npm run compile:watch" "npm start"
scripts.pre-build: node ./node_modules/del-cli/cli.js "./dist" && npm run copy:package:files && cd ./dist && npm install --production
scripts.build: npm run pre-build && npm run compile
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/tslint/bin/tslint -p tsconfig.json -c tslint.json --fix ./src/**/*.ts && echo "--- completed lint task ---"
scripts.test: npm run pre-test && npm run test:build && node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha
scripts.test:coverage: npm run pre-test && npm run test:build && node ./node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha
scripts.security:scan: npm audit && node ./node_modules/lockfile-lint/bin/lockfile-lint.js --path package-lock.json --type npm --validate-https --allowed-hosts npm
